MESSAGE.name: DjVuIW44Parse.bad_after_gamma
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Invalid text after GAMMA specification

MESSAGE.name: DjVuIW44Parse.bad_gamma
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Invalid GAMMA specified

MESSAGE.name: DjVuIW44Parse.bad_list2
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Invalid %1!s! list. Must be list of float numbers separated by commas.

MESSAGE.name: DjVuIW44Parse.bad_list
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Invalid %1!s! list. Must be list of integers separated by commas.

MESSAGE.name: DjVuIW44Parse.crcbdelay
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] The value for --crcbdelay option should be between 1 and 32 inclusive

MESSAGE.name: DjVuIW44Parse.empty_list
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Empty %1!s! list specified.

MESSAGE.name: DjVuIW44Parse.incompat_opt
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Option %1!s! may not be used together with %2!s!.

MESSAGE.name: DjVuIW44Parse.neg_val
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] All values in %1!s! list must be positive.

MESSAGE.name: DjVuIW44Parse.quality
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] The value for --quality option should be between 1 and 100 inclusive

MESSAGE.name: PhotoToDjVu.bad_dpi
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Invalid dpi option

MESSAGE.name: PhotoToDjVu.bad_format
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Invalid image format.

MESSAGE.name: PhotoToDjVu.continued
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Continued past error.

MESSAGE.name: PhotoToDjVu.decode_fail
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Failed to decode page

MESSAGE.name: PhotoToDjVu.no_page
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] No Page For Encoding

MESSAGE.name: PhotoToDjVu.no_trans
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Transformations are not allowed when using the --jpeg option.

MESSAGE.name: PhotoToDjVu.null_image
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] NULL image

MESSAGE.name: PhotoToDjVu.one_chunk
MESSAGE.value: [1-%0!05u!] Only one JPEG chunk is allowed with JPEG DjVu

MESSAGE.name: --crcbdelay
MESSAGE.value: %1!s!=<1-32> The chrominance delay effects color blurring and size.

MESSAGE.name: --crcbfull
MESSAGE.value: %1!s! Full chrominance quality compression.

MESSAGE.name: --crcbhalf
MESSAGE.value: %1!s! Half resolution chrominance compression.

MESSAGE.name: --crcbnone
MESSAGE.value: %1!s! No chrominance will be used in the compression.

MESSAGE.name: --crcbnormal
MESSAGE.value: %1!s! Normal chrominance quality compression.

MESSAGE.name: --decibels
MESSAGE.value: %1!s!=#.#,#.#,... A list float decibel minimums per chunk.

MESSAGE.name: --gamma
MESSAGE.value: %1!s!=<0.3-5.0> Gamma factor (default 2.2).

MESSAGE.name: --jpeg
MESSAGE.value: %1!s! Output pseudo DjVu. Input files must be JPEG.

MESSAGE.name: --quality
MESSAGE.value: %1!s!=<1-100> Photo/Background Quality (1 lowest, default is 75).

MESSAGE.name: --sizes
MESSAGE.value: %1!s!=#,#,... A list of the minimum size (in bytes) per chunk.

MESSAGE.name: --slices
MESSAGE.value: %1!s!=#,#,... A list of the minimum # of slices per chunk.
